website_summaries.verdict: Sturdy and attractive pool basketball set that has occasional quality control issues.
pros: Consumers appreciate that this has an appealing design
Sturdy enough that it doesn't tip
It's also good for multiple ages from young kids to adults
cons: Installation also tends to be more difficult than other models

customer_reviews.title: Major RUST Issues!!!
customer_reviews.text: We've had this hoop for 2 years and although my husband and oldest son love that they have a full size hoop for the pool, it is completely falling apart with severe rusting issues in several areas. The base of the pole is literally crumbling leaving a huge mess all over my pool deck, not to mention the big safety concern with little ones running around. I've put in a claim as the product is supposed to have a 5 year warranty. Let's hope they make it right!
customer_reviews.author: Christie A. Thorsen

customer_reviews.title: No Rust
customer_reviews.text: Based on previous reviews I sprayed my hoop with clear paint while I was assembling it. No rust, I've had this for almost two years now - outside in AZ weather.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Hargis

customer_reviews.title: Otherwise it seems to be made pretty well and my son loves the full size rim
customer_reviews.text: We took the advise of others and sprayed this with clear rustoleum in hopes it would help with rusting on our pool deck. Fingers crossed. Otherwise it seems to be made pretty well and my son loves the full size rim!
customer_reviews.author: Ironsmom

customer_reviews.title: Rust-et ball. What a joke!
customer_reviews.text: Was fooled by the star rating as appeared to be a great item for pool. NOT!!!! THIS IS A RUST BUCKET THAT WILL STAIN YOUR CONCRETE AND/OR PAVERS... THEN FALL APART. Read all the reviews and see if others have a solution as I didn't, and am paying for it ever since. Only 2 years old and ready for the trash due to rust.
customer_reviews.author: WalterB

customer_reviews.title: The kids like the hoop though
customer_reviews.text: KLaw July 24, 2017 review said it all, couldn’t agree more. I sprayed the whole thing down with Rustoleum a few times just to see if it made a difference. It’s been up for about a month, the only rust I see this far is on the rim solders. I also used a 2x3 outdoor mat under the front half of the system to protect my concrete if it does decide to rust. Putting sand into those little holes was ridiculous to the point of hilarity. The kids like the hoop though!
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: sturdy, realistic, and FUN
customer_reviews.text: The installation was difficult, for sure, and at times required two sets of hands. I would recommend a good wrench set before partaking. The end result was worth it. We've been playing a lot in the pool and, with water as a base weight, it hasn't budged. I have it set up a little high to discourage dunking, though. The feel of a mini basketball off the backboard seems true. This set has definitely enhanced our pool time!
customer_reviews.author: Michael J. Greenberg

customer_reviews.title: Dual Use Basketball System
customer_reviews.text: Granddaughter was upset her big brother's basketball hoop was too high for her to use unless she was picked up (she's three). This basketball unit serves two purposes. My granddaughter is thrilled she can use it and have fun playing basketball on the lowest (4 ft.) setting AND it can be turned around (by an adult) when ready to use for some basketball while in the pool (at the 6 ft. setting). Great investment and much better quality than the cheaper made youth basketball units!
customer_reviews.author: Neenah

customer_reviews.title: Nice basketball system for the pool
customer_reviews.text: Nice basketball system for the pool. I sprayed all painted surfaces with a clearcoat before I installed and after several months not a hint of rust despite being outside by the pool since it was put together. I have the base filled with water and no leaks. Great for the kids and looks sharp. highly recommend and we will see how it holds up for next summer.
customer_reviews.author: E-Man

customer_reviews.title: This is by far the best quality pool basketball hoop I've seen
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best quality pool basketball hoop I've seen. I have 2 sons and often have a pool full of teenage boys, they play some pretty intense games of ball. We used to have one of the smaller plastic hoops and it was often knocked over or having the rim popped off. Not with this hoop! The anchor chains are definitely helpful also. It doesn't tip or pull at all.
customer_reviews.author: momof3kids

customer_reviews.title: Not "Lifetime"
customer_reviews.text: Had this for hoop for five years. Easy to move around but it is not a "lifetime" hoop. It started rusting with in the first year. Everywinter I would store the thing in a shed. Even with storing it in a dry place for the winter, after 5 years it rusted out. My brother in law has a different style at it is going on 10 years. I'll be buying that one and not this one again.
customer_reviews.author: Donald H. Love

customer_reviews.title: Seem to have improved it vs previous models
customer_reviews.text: We have a salt water pool, and the previous version of this rusted through in 5 years. This was purchased as a replacement for it, and we'd planned on plasti-dipping the bottom metal portions of it to try and protect it further - hwoever i'm not sure we need to do that. This model has what looks to be a powder coating on the frame that the previous one didn't - not entirely sure this will offer additional protection from the salt corrosion, but i think it will.
customer_reviews.author: scott

customer_reviews.title: Rust began after 10 days of use
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. This is the second one of these I have bought. The first one started to rust after the first full summer of use in our salt pool. We were still able to get 2 more summers out of it before the rust became too much and the main pole fell apart when attempting to move the hoop. This one started to rust almost immediately....literally within 7-10 days of first use, in several spots around the hoop and the main pole. I make sure to hose off the hoop after every use in an effort to maintain the hoops integrity and to avoid the rust! There has to be a better way.....very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Scott R.

customer_reviews.title: RUST IS A MAJOR ISSUE!
customer_reviews.text: RUSTED within first year, dripped onto pool deck and stained it. This should NEVER be an issue with a product designed for pool use. It’s a shame because my children loved it. Also a shame I have been too overwhelmed with family issues to pursue warranty...
customer_reviews.author: sherL

customer_reviews.title: Great, sturdy goal
customer_reviews.text: This is the goal for older teens and adults (kids, too.). Built sturdy and tough. It behaves just like a real basketball goal. The other reviews about rusting are true. This is actually our 3rd goal in 6 years. Each one lasts 2 years, even with spraying the "no rust spray." It rusts so badly it falls apart and is no longer safe to use. It is a great goal, just know it'll only last around 2 years, however, there isn't another this sturdy we could find.
customer_reviews.author: Family Man

customer_reviews.title: Rusted within 18 months
customer_reviews.text: Not only did this product begin to rust within the first 18 months, a large chunk of rust at the base (see pic) fell off into my (new) pool and stained my finish. It cost me over $200 to remove it. Complete disappointment. I eventually had to spray all of the metal with Rustoleum paint but by then it was too late. After being on hold for almost 20 minutes with customer service I was told that "rust is not covered". An outdoor product and rust is not covered. STEER CLEAR OF THIS PRODUCT!
customer_reviews.author: Mason

customer_reviews.title: Rusty in only two months
customer_reviews.text: My teen boys put this together themselves. It was definitely worth the money since they play with it every day. My only gripe and it's a serious one is that something that is MADE for swimming pool use should be rust proof. I told my family that other reviewers suggested to spray clear Rustoleum on metal parts first but they thought it wasn't necessary. Well it certainly shouldn't be necessary but it is!!
customer_reviews.author: UrbanDixie

customer_reviews.title: My kids loved it during the summer but we hosed it off ...
customer_reviews.text: So this thing completely rusted out in less than 2 years. My kids loved it during the summer but we hosed it off during the fall, winter and spring, stored it indoors and took meticulous care of it. It literally fell apart from rust. We swept it up and threw it away.
customer_reviews.author: GJC

customer_reviews.title: RUST!
customer_reviews.text: this was a 5 star however, we have had this for a year and it was stored in the garage when the pool was closed for winter. ALL OF THS SCREWS HAVE RUSTED CAUSING STAINING TO MY NEW TRAVERTINE! This is unacceptable for an outdoor toy.
customer_reviews.author: supercooper

customer_reviews.title: Horrible rust issues
customer_reviews.text: It's great for pool but it has totally rusted out leaving my pool and tiles with major rust stains that wont come out and I just had my whole pool redone Want to know how to get replacement parts since it's got a 5 year warranty HELP
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Great pool hoop, but the rust is a dealbreaker!
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome basketball hoop for the pool...at least until the rust sets in and stains your pool and concrete. I did what others have done regarding rust inhibitors and this did nothing to prevent the metal from rusting within the first year. I contacted Lifetime and they did replace the item, but I haven't had the confidence to put this together again and go through the frustration of assembly and having the same problem occur.
customer_reviews.author: Icbomber73

customer_reviews.title: For indoor use only.  Will rust and destroy your concrete.
customer_reviews.text: 2 years old and rusted straight through. I do not live near the coast. Look at the photos. Do not buy this.
customer_reviews.author: David D.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: We read reviews and when we assembled the item added extra spray paint to the connections and ends to prevent the rust that seemed to be the major complaint... it has been a staple at our pool parties for years now. Great sturdy pool item and thank you for your attention to creating an item that will last for years.
customer_reviews.author: M.J.B

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for the $
customer_reviews.text: I would say this is the best pool hoop for your money. They can be very expensive. The hoop is very sturdy even without bolting to the pool deck. I filled it with water and added chlorine. My son jumps in and dunks on it constantly and he loves it! The one thing to watch out for is rust coming from the main poles inside on the pool deck. I just pulled it forward over the water. Granted we have a saltwater pool and will speed up its rusting. We try to rinse it with fresh water at the end of a pool day.
customer_reviews.author: mg

customer_reviews.title: Pile
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t last one summer , this item is cheaply built
customer_reviews.author: JW

customer_reviews.title: It rusts!!
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed in this hoop. In spite of spraying every piece of metal with clear coat/anti-rust spray, the entire base and rim have rusted out including leaving a stain on my deck. I've only had this for one year so to say that it is a "lifetime" product is not accurate in my opinion. I'm now in the market for a replacement with more plastic parts and this one will be put out with the trash. While the functionality was good, the rust makes it look cheap and it is leaving marks everywhere i put it.
customer_reviews.author: Joanna Eckhardt

customer_reviews.title: Rust!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve purchased two of these. Each time sprayed with a rust protectant and each time rusted. It’s too bad, my son and his friends love this goal, and it’s a great goal, but just a rust bucket!
customer_reviews.author: Deborah K. Kaschik

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and well built but major rust problems in saltwater pool
customer_reviews.text: I had read the reviews about rusting and I double coated every piece of metal in clear Rustoleum before assembly. This was used as a poolside goal for our salt water pool. The goal is solidly built but began showing rust signs within 6 months and was falling completely apart within two years. It left major rust stains on my pool decking that required muriatic acid to remove. I can only recommend this goal completely for away from a pool. If used pool side, expect 1-2 year lifespan with major rust cleanup.
customer_reviews.author: Jody Wallen

customer_reviews.title: best pool basketball set for us
customer_reviews.text: Perfect addition to our sports pool. We read a few reviews about rust and we did what others said to do since we have a salt water pool in FL with lots of rain. Just painted all metal with clear rust-oleum and we are happy and excited to have lots of years out of this basketball fun time in our pool. I took alot of time to look at all the different pool basketball sets out there and this was the best for us options. We like that it is sturdy, well made and was easy to put together with two people. we are enjoying our new pool fun. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: T. Connors

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking and Fun
customer_reviews.text: This is my 3rd time purchasing this pool Basketball Hoop. It looks good and is sturdy enough to play with but its a quickly rusting product. I put it in the garage for winter and only get 2 seasons out it. But will most likely buy a new one with this one is consumed with rust. Just know what you are purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Inspect Before you Assemble.
customer_reviews.text: The goal is sturdy but you will need more than one person to assist with assembly. We were exited about this goal but sadly after assembling it we realized that the backboard has some minor damage.
customer_reviews.author: Ronnie A.

customer_reviews.title: This hoop worked great for us for 3 years for the pool at ...
customer_reviews.text: This hoop worked great for us for 3 years for the pool at our SC beach house. We kept it outside year round. Because of the close proximity to the beach, the metal parts began rusting after a few months. After 3 years of use, one of the metal support bars rusted so much that the rust ate right through the bar, breaking it in two. I am guessing if this is not installed near the beach and kept outside all year, it would probably hold up longer. I am still giving it 4 stars because it worked so well for us, but be more careful than I was!
customer_reviews.author: ccb

customer_reviews.title: Came in Used when ordered New and had a lot of rust on it.
customer_reviews.text: There was a lot of rust on the product and I have a video of the product. I ordered it two weeks ago and it came in today due to corona virus however it came in used and there was paint chips all over it. 0/10 would not buy this product again unless it came in a new version. I have assembled it already and tested it. Other than the poor product coming in rusted and the assembly coming with very confusing instructions makes this annoying to build. I am very angry customer.
customer_reviews.author: Kenny

customer_reviews.title: Stop looking for a better one cause this is it.
customer_reviews.text: This is definitely well-made and worth the money. There was a lot of reviews about it rusting and falling apart through time so I applied a few coats of clear enamel to prevent the saltwater pool from rusting it. Even if it lasts a few seasons and falls apart it was still worth the money...Don’t forget to buy a pool basketball too
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent basketball hoop
customer_reviews.text: Excellent basketball hoop, well made, took me about 1.5hrs to assemble taking my time, filled the base with water and will drain for the winter and keep the hoop inside. Coated all the bolts with vasoline to prevent corrosion, the unit is only two weeks old will see how the unit holds up, seems to be well made hopefully will get many years of use, enjoy its worth the money, Jim.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 3 teenage boys and it works great. Very sturdy and will withstand rough kiddos. I would definitely recommend this product to anyone wanting a quality poolside goal at a great price point.
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Installation was as expected
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Installation was as expected...a little difficult; especially with one person. We've been using it for a while now and it has stayed in excellent shape.
customer_reviews.author: AARON PREDUM

customer_reviews.title: Very nice hoop!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice, heavy duty basketball pool hoop. It took me about 2-3 hours or so to put together and I would rate myself as average as putting stuff like this together. But it's exactly as advertised....I did spray it with rustoleum so we'll see how it makes it through the summer/fall.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Linson

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality and Sturdy. Time Consuming to Assemble
customer_reviews.text: Good Quality and Sturdy. Looks like it will last a few years in direct sunlight. Time Consuming to Assemble, Way more difficult than it needed to be BUT that is probably why it is as inexpensive as it is. Recommend just make sure you have a two hours and patience on your side.
customer_reviews.author: Gent430

customer_reviews.title: Rusted Quickly
customer_reviews.text: The hoop and inside of the pole rusted and stained our concrete around our pool in 2 months. While a quality product, the rust factor on the painted outside and unpainted inside of the pole & hoop made it necessary for us to take down the unit and trash it.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Burkhart

customer_reviews.title: Gets Rusty and Corroded
customer_reviews.text: I received this item in May. it was somewhat difficult to assemble, you need two people to do so (this was expected). Once assembled it looked really neat and is fun to use. It's now September (5 months later), the paint on the rim and metal components is peeling, it's getting rusty and corroded. I did see other had reviewed this item with concerns as such, however, the number of positive reviews made me buy it. I regret it now and wish I would get a refund. I would not recomend buying this item.
customer_reviews.author: S. E.

customer_reviews.title: WILL RUST
customer_reviews.text: Bought this pool side basketball goal in June of 2015 and at the end of the pool season here in SC and was putting things away in 2017 when moving the goal it had rusted so bad that the poles snapped and parts just crumbled. The only thing that made it was the base and backboard even the rim rusted. Now am looking for a new basketball goal. Would not recomend. Face it metal and water do not mix.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: Great deal for the price.
customer_reviews.text: It takes some time to put together but once it’s done this thing is impressive. It’s bigger than I thought it would be and for the price the size and quality is great. Very good value here and I recommend it for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Sir Buys-a-lot

customer_reviews.title: Love this basketball hoop
customer_reviews.text: Love this basketball hoop. Yes it will rust if you do not maintain it.. I clear coat paint it every season and store it indoors in the winter. This is the third season and it has held up nicely
customer_reviews.author: James Noble

customer_reviews.title: Rusty hardware after 1 month.
customer_reviews.text: We love this new hoop. After a month of use, all the metal hardware is starting to rust. Which is unfortunate. I’ll be replacing all hardware with stainless steel. Hopefully that will work. Our pool is a saltwater pool so maybe that is the cause of corrosion.
customer_reviews.author: Brent Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: this hoop is very good buy! Very much worth the money. It's very sturdy & well built. It has been a great addition to our pool. I think my husband enjoys it more than the kids! UPDATE ONE YEAR LATER:: We are going into our 2nd summer with this hoop & still have yet to see any rust that many of the reviews state. We even left the hoop outside for the entire winter where it was subject to a lot of moisture. This thing is still going strong!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda S

customer_reviews.title: Worth it if youre looking for a fun activity poolside
customer_reviews.text: Wasn't too hard to assemble. Be careful tightening the rim, it will start to become uneven if one side is tightened more than the other. Had some issues with swaying of backboard but just needed to tighten the telescope and base legs bolts really tight. Though the questions say it came with a basketball.. It does not. You will need to purchase one, just make sure it will grip in water, worth touching before purchase. Have a large pool and its a bit big but still excited to use. Worth the money if you're not trying to break the bank.
customer_reviews.author: Erik

customer_reviews.title: Fun fun fun
customer_reviews.text: It was a little tough to put together, seemed like instructions could have had more detail. But We love the goal. It’s been fun so far this year.
customer_reviews.author: mclayton

customer_reviews.title: Let’s shoot hoops
customer_reviews.text: Fun hoop. Larger than I anticipated. Not easy to move but that’s okay. Like that it’s not gonna just fall in pool with hard shot or summer storm.
customer_reviews.author: R. Koehler

customer_reviews.title: solid build
customer_reviews.text: the assembly instructions were not the best. Very sturdy and a solid product. It took 3 of us to get it done but it looks great
customer_reviews.author: Virginia Customer

customer_reviews.title: Rusted away
customer_reviews.text: Rusted and fell apart in 3 years. I no longer have a basketball hoop by my pool. Disappointing
customer_reviews.author: Maci Fisher

customer_reviews.title: VERY sturdy. I believe the teenagers will have a hard ...
customer_reviews.text: This is our third pool basketball hoop in the last 3 years! I have a feeling that this one will last much longer than the previous 2. It is bigger than the others were and of much higher quality in construction. VERY sturdy. I believe the teenagers will have a hard time wrecking this one... at least I hope so!
customer_reviews.author: A P

customer_reviews.title: Fun for the entire family
customer_reviews.text: My husband put it together in less than an hour and he is not one to follow directions...the kids and adults love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Chi town roots

customer_reviews.title: Good pool side goal
customer_reviews.text: Good pool side goal. Had for a year and is completely rusted out. I have a salt water pool. This will happen no matter what u do. Salt water destroys metal. I know this cause I work offshore. So don't expect it not to rust unless u keep constant fresh water on it
customer_reviews.author: Leeboy5

customer_reviews.title: Nice Sturdy Pool Hoop
customer_reviews.text: This hoop is excellent quality. My kids love it. We took the advice of other reviewers and sprayed it with rustoleum clear prior to assembly. So far we have had no issues and seen no rust. We love it.
customer_reviews.author: 1fitmommy

customer_reviews.title: Great goal for the money!
customer_reviews.text: Had this goal about a month. Good quality. All our friends like it too. Great goal for the money and in comparison to others. We just have an inground chlorine supplied pool. If you have a salt water system you may want to spray paint with a coating before using.
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: Great pool basketball hoop
customer_reviews.text: We have had this for about 7 months now. It has been great. We had people 200+ hang on it. It came lose just had to tighten it after teenage boys paying on it a lot. I would say it has been worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Cabrera

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: So far a 2 nuts do not fit the screws provided. Now the axel spacer doesn’t have holes big enough to fit the axels. At this point pretty disappointed. I can’t tell you about the maneuverability or sturdiness because I can’t get it together.
customer_reviews.author: FinancialChick

customer_reviews.title: Love this for the pool
customer_reviews.text: A little intense to put together but having someone towards the final steps definitely helps. Great product for the price. Super sturdy and easy to move.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: Pricey
customer_reviews.text: Took a while to get , thought it would be not as higher can’t dunk. Can’t put it in the deep end of the pool
customer_reviews.author: Richard Kancy

customer_reviews.title: Not too difficult to put together, but do need ...
customer_reviews.text: Not too difficult to put together, but do need an extra set of hands towards the end when aligning the rim and backboard. Sprayed Rust-Oleum clear finish as other have suggested.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Smith

customer_reviews.title: Hours of poolside fun
customer_reviews.text: Good assembly instructions and once built is very sturdy. Excellent poolside fun.
customer_reviews.author: Sound Mixer Spock

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Hardest thing I have ever put together. Materials do not line up.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Solid Hoop Setup
customer_reviews.text: Great poolside hoop setup. Withstood a pounding from aggro cousins too. It calls for drilling into the concrete to anchor it but I just tied rope from the bars to the winter cover screws in the pool deck. Either way you need to secure it in case a leak were to develop in the water storage compartment
customer_reviews.author: John C. Pappas

customer_reviews.title: The is a nice basketball goal and looks like it will last a ...
customer_reviews.text: The is a nice basketball goal and looks like it will last a long time. Larger then I expected, it is the size of a regular basketball goal. I sprayed it with Rustoleum to help keep it from rusting based on other reviews. It was a little difficult to put together, you will need at least 2 people and patience.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy W

customer_reviews.title: Impossible to return if put together and then issue identified
customer_reviews.text: My teenage boys really like it BUT It was not easy to put together it is a 2 person job at least. Main complaint. .....put it together and when filled with water....IT LEAKS. it is not reasonable to expect someone to take it apart and ship back. BASICALLY BUYER BEWARE. If you have it assembled and something breaks or whatever you're basically screwed unless you want to disassemble and ship back. That is NOT REASONABLE
customer_reviews.author: ralph C

customer_reviews.title: Great!  Kids love it!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect pool basketball goal. Very sturdy and makes our pool the favorite place to be. Not sure that is always a good thing. LOL .
customer_reviews.author: Nicole D.

customer_reviews.title: Rust is going to eat this product away in short order unless constant pm is done.
customer_reviews.text: Installed and began use in May of 2108. Just inspected unit and bolts and nuts holding goal badly rusted as well as weld joint on goal itself. This is a shame because the overall design and structure of this set is pretty good and for a couple of dollars or so more, Lifetime could have included stainless steel hardware and/or advised rust preventative measures. For this reason, I would not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality and item appears to be very well made
customer_reviews.text: Arrived late due to Hurricane Irma but understandable. It took 2 people and about 1.5 hours to put together. Excellent quality and item appears to be very well made. My 11 & 12 year old boys played with it all afternoon after setup today. We placed 4 sandbags on top of the base instead of filling with water or sand and it is very sturdy. Moves easily with installed wheels. This product exceeded my expectations! We look forward to many years of fun!!
customer_reviews.author: Allyson Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but RUST will consume it...and your pool deck
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, with the exception of the seemingly insurmountable rust issue. We also tried spraying metal parts before setting outside, but after 2 seasons, it is completely rusted up and no longer safe to use.
customer_reviews.author: Fam of Five

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy, kids love it
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this hoop. The kids love it and the hoop has stood up to lots of abuse--both from play and from sun/wind/weather. Would recommend this hoop to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: NMChknHwk

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and well made
customer_reviews.text: The pricing is attractive and the product is clearly well made. We've had it for a a few short weeks so I cannot speak to the rusting issues but it is clear that they went through some efforts to prevent the issue. The powdered paint coating is truly well done. Time will tell. I think storing the unit in the winter will bring some longevity to it. The unit is very stable and will not give at all when using the backboard for your shots. It does take a little bit of time to put it together especially by yourself but It's a quality product and I am happy to recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This this is awesome
customer_reviews.text: Dont really do reviews but we have owned this for 5 years now and just touched it up with a little paint and a new net. This thing is rock solid. So well made for $100 wow. Buy it you wont regret it. Very happy customer.
customer_reviews.author: mamaof3

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I sprayed painted to protect it from rust per previous reviews and it has worked
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best one I have seen.
customer_reviews.text: Best thing we have bought for the pool!! Kids play for hours. Very sturdy. Best one I have seen. Looks great by the pool too...
customer_reviews.author: Brian Summers

customer_reviews.title: Awesome my son and his friends use this all the ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome my son and his friends use this all the time. They are 12 yrs old and give it an outright beating!! It took about 30 min to assemble for two people. I recommend this if your kids play BB in the pool and you want something that will look good and stand up to some punishment.
customer_reviews.author: Tim McCallan

customer_reviews.title: Hoop rusted after only 3 months.
customer_reviews.text: Only has the basketball hoop a few months and it’s already rusting. Extremely disappointing!
customer_reviews.author: Melinda Saraullo

customer_reviews.title: Extremely sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This is awesome. It is extremely sturdy and looks like it will last for many years. My kids and their friends (and I) have had a lot of fun with it. It's pretty tall even on the shortest setting so might not be ideal for little kids.
customer_reviews.author: Tim J.

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this hoop for my son's birthday. He has been in the pool the entire summer playing basketball. The hoop is very large and durable but take hours to set up. If you are handy with tools and assembly, do not purchase this hoop. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Isabelle - Florida

customer_reviews.title: Best quality!
customer_reviews.text: Best quality!! We had a family reunion at our house and there were 6 men playing bball in the pool and this thing was amazing! They all had a blast!
customer_reviews.author: Jolene Kroeger

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome!!! BUT be advised that this is a pain to put together. Took me and my husband quite some time to put it together and directions were a little confusing. But it looks great and is perfect by our pool
customer_reviews.author: bridget s.

customer_reviews.title: Use the App with 3D Imaging for setup instructions, works great!
customer_reviews.text: Everything was well packed and relatively easy to assemble. There are 2 metal plates that slide onto the wheel axle where 1 hole (on both plates) was not drilled out enough to slide onto both shafts. Had to drill this out a bit myself. Other than this issue, pretty solid all the way around.
customer_reviews.author: J W J

customer_reviews.title: Some rust...
customer_reviews.text: Not bad. Had it for a month now and seeing some rust already. Getting some touch up paint to cover it. But should not have too.
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Good for about two years
customer_reviews.text: This is a great hoop and my son and his friends have a great time dunking. However, it rusted within two years and needs to be replaced. I started repainting the rim and bottom pole, but it was no good. I am looking something that last longer than two years.
customer_reviews.author: julie

customer_reviews.title: Love! Bought it with uncertainty - life size - ...
customer_reviews.text: Love! Bought it with uncertainty - life size - easy to put together. Sturdy - keeps us entertained at the pool.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Collier

customer_reviews.title: Fairly sturdy and easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Fairly sturdy and easy to assemble. Saw lots of use this summer with no problems. Not the best looking having this huge white plastic tub attached to a goal next to an awesome pool, but it does work.
customer_reviews.author: Duke

customer_reviews.title: Rust and bad part
customer_reviews.text: This product is not rust resistant. I even sprayed it with rustoleum after reading some online suggestions and it still managed to get some rust after one season of use. It also would assemble properly. The parts for the wheels didn’t fit together properly so I need to call and get a new crossbar that is the correct size.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy goal
customer_reviews.text: Great quality goal. I followed other reviews and spray painted it with a rust free clear coat before putting it together. So far so good. No rust.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal b

customer_reviews.title: This is perfect!
customer_reviews.text: So far, we really love this by the pool. It looks so nice and has been so much fun. We filled ours with water. My husband did dunk on it once and it didn’t budge. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Arizona Fergy

customer_reviews.title: Owned for 8 months now, big hit for summer!
customer_reviews.text: We just built our pool and this was the first year. I bought this basketball hoop for my kids and they love it. We are always playing horse and just shooting around. The hoop looks like it will last several years. It is solid built, and, and looks great next to the pool. I would recommend it everybody! We love it!
customer_reviews.author: john d

customer_reviews.title: Good price, good fun.
customer_reviews.text: I found this easy to install and very stable when we use it in our pool. Personally I thought it was easy to assemble. I am moderately handy with tools. It took me 30". We have been using it for a month and we really enjoy it. Also it cost 1/4 of what the pool builder was selling one for.
customer_reviews.author: Hawkeye Pierce

customer_reviews.title: Love it. Great build quality.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent build quality. Kids love it. I personally haven't had a rust issue, as others mention, but only had one season now. Just to be safe, I sprayed the hoop and bolts with anti rust clear coat- per recommendation from other reviewers.
customer_reviews.author: Paul M.

customer_reviews.title: Very solid product.  Definitely pre-treat for rust before using.  Kids love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very solid built product. Took a while to put together. Definitely recommend spraying with a rustoleum spray to prevent this from rusting. I sprayed all the metal including the rim thoroughly to prevent the rust as stated in other people's reviews. My kids have loved this. Great for pool parties!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it!
customer_reviews.text: 2nd time purchasing. The last one rusted pretty bad & stained our pool deck. So this one I sprayed with clear coat protection to see if it helps reduce the rusting.
customer_reviews.author: atl lynn

customer_reviews.title: we continue to buy because it’s a great value & great fun for our boys in the ...
customer_reviews.text: This is our second one in five years. We leave outside in FL weather & typically lasts 2-3 years before it rusts out. However, we continue to buy because it’s a great value & great fun for our boys in the pool.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Great product, my only complaint is screws are rusted on backboard after only a couple months.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke

customer_reviews.title: Simply Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and fairly easy to put together. Hardest part is filling the base with sand (recommend sand over water) . Make sure the sand is good and dry or it will difficult. Everyone loves shooting hoops in the pool and the rim is high enough to where dunking is difficult, which is a good thing when you have idiot teenagers trying to show off...
customer_reviews.author: Marc Williams

customer_reviews.title: Pleased with this product!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this basketball goal for my grandkids to use while in the swimming pool and it's been terrific. It's well constructed and was fairly easy to assemble. I did read some of the other reviews about parts starting to rust, so I went ahead and coated the metal parts with a protective clear coat before assembly. I haven't seen any signs of rust or any other deterioration. I am very pleased with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Tenn Gal

customer_reviews.title: Great for inground pools
customer_reviews.text: This basketball hoop was everything we were looking for. My 5 year old grandson to my 30 year old kids and friends all enjoy it. Nice value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Kids have loved it. Very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Product came quickly. Kids have loved it. Very sturdy. We had shopped at some pool stores and found the goals to be poor quality and very expensive. I would totally buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Аmazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Missing parts, 1 hrs on hold, box was falling apart on arrival, no parts for 2 weeks. DO NOT BUY!
customer_reviews.author: B

product_meta.title: Lifetime Pool Side Basketball System
feature_bullets: 44” Shatterproof Fusion Backboard integrates a polycarbonate playing surface with an unbreakable polyethylene frame for a durable, pro glass look
The pole is uv-protected and rust-resistant making it durable and strong. White 27 Gallon base provides stability and portability; Can be filled with water or sand
Telescoping height adjustment that adjusts from 4 to 6.5 feet in 6 inch increments
Graphics are screen-printed with UV-protected inks for superior color and protection against the elements.
2-piece round steel pole is protected with a powder-coated, weather-resistant finish
Original classic basketball rim features a 5/8-inch solid-steel ring supported by 1/2-inch braces and an all-weather nylon net

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
